sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const AM = () => { const [loanAmount, setLoanAmount] = useState(0); const [loanYears, setLoanYears] = useState(0); const [loanMonths, setLoanMonths] = useState(0); const [interestRate, setInterestRate] = useState(0); const [payment, setPayment] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { let months = loanYears * 12; setLoanMonths(months); }, [loanYears]); const handleClick = () => { let value = loanAmount * ((interestRate / 100) / loanMonths); setPayment(value); } return (

Loan amount

setLoanAmount(parseFloat(e.target.value))} />

Loan term in years

setLoanYears(parseFloat(e.target.value))} value={loanYears} />
or

Loan term in months

setLoanMonths(parseFloat(e.target.value))} value={loanMonths} />

Interest rate per year

setInterestRate(parseFloat(e.target.value))} />

Show amortization schedule

${payment === 0 ? 0 : payment.toFixed(2)}
Monthly Payments
Total Principal Paid
${loanAmount ? loanAmount : 0}
Total Interest Paid
$5,000
) } export default AM;
